head.title: Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) – Health Services – Westfield High School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Westfield High School serves students and is located in Westfield, NJ.

ul.li: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) - cdc.gov

li.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) - Mental Health Guidance and Tips

24-Hour Public Hotline: 1-800-222-1222

New Jersey Department of Human Services - nj.gov/humanservices/coronavirus.html
New Jersey Mental Health Cares Telephone Support (8a-8p): 1-866-202-HELP (4357)

li.span: Westfield Mental Health Council Coronavirus Resources - westfieldnj.gov/mentalhealthcoronavirusresources

div.span: Helpful e-learning resources for parents, including Webex, Google Hangouts/Meet, Google Classroom and more can be found at this LINK.

regarding Free and Reduced Lunch can be found on the district website under “Food Services” on the “Family Resources” tab. A family who does not already receive Free and Reduced Lunch services, should email the completed form to
